short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple site blocker with password protection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SiteShield is a user-friendly website blocking extension designed to help you maintain focus and enhance productivity while browsing the internet. With built-in password protection, you can secure the settings to prevent unauthorized changes, ensuring that your block list remains intact.
